document_name: dgttf donor template sigend mid term report dgttf 2013.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/PAL/dgttf donor template sigend mid term report dgttf 2013.pdf

outputs.output_descr: In the absence of free and fair elections the need for finding other ways for Palestinian citizens to voice their opinions and extracting accountability is needed. This project supports the role of youth in local public oversight  to ensure that civil society, and in particular marginalized groups like youth, are heard through meaningful participation and are able to hold officials to their responsibilities and to ensure recourse when those responsibilities are not fulfilled.

project_descr: This project aims to strengthen the capacity of youth and civil society organizations (CSOs) to monitor and provide feedback to local government bodies on municipal performance for improved service delivery and youth political participation.
